com.samskivert.swing
Class SmartPolygon

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Polygon
      com.samskivert.swing.SmartPolygon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape, Serializable
public class SmartPolygon
extends Polygon

Extends the AWT polygon class and provides a Polygon.getBounds() method that doesn't annoyingly make a copy of the bounds rectangle every time it is returned.

See Also:
Serialized Form

public Rectangle getBoundingBox()
